title.narrative: Emergency preparedness and response to vulnerable populations in South Sudan

description.narrative: 20,000 vulnerable target populations will receive assistance to meet immediate food needs . WASH needs of 60,000 vulnerable target populations are responded to quickly and effectively by the Emergency Preparedness & Response Team.

participating-org.narrative: UN High Commissioner for Refugees UNHCR

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY

provider-org.narrative: UN High Commissioner for Refugees UNHCR
